summary:
This mod adds several NPCs to Skyrim who will act as stewards for your
various Hearthfires properties in case you seek someone more flavorful than
the default vanilla options.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Skyrim Stewards[/size][/color][/font]


[font=Times New Roman][size=4]This mod adds several NPCs to Skyrim who will act as stewards for your [/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]various Hearthfires properties in case you seek someone more flavorful than [/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]the default vanilla options. 
[/size][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][size=4]This mod features several new NPC "followers" as potential stewards for your various Hearthfires-properties, this is mainly in case you want to keep the original choices as followers or housecarls. The new stewards can and will act as followers if you so desire, however be warned that they are not designated for combat or to be serious followers as they were meant primarily for stewarding duties. 

[The Stewards]

[img]https://s26.postimg.cc/c6xc8x6ih/Stewards.jpg[/img]

As of Update 2.0...

[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]A. Carlo Herennia 
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Location: Bard's College in Solitude 
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]B. Cecily Jurard
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Location: Dwemer Museum, Markarth. 
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]C. Lograk
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Location: Narzulbur.
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]D. Nurik
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Location: Palace of the Kings Upstairs, Windhelm. 
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]E. Shalia
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Location: The Arcaneum, College of Winterhold. 
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]F. Shevki
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Location: Haelga's Bunkhouse in Riften
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]G. Verys Andrano 
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Location: Vilemyr Inn, Ivarstead
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]H. Zamindar
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Location: Nightgate Inn
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]I. Terendiel
Location: Angi's Camp, Falkreath Mountains. 
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]...and lastly one more 'special' Steward for our more vampire-inclinded Dovahkiin;[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]J. Arthas
[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Location: Ratway Warrens, in Riften. [/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Requirements [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][size=4]All Skyrim DLC, no exceptions. 


[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Nine distinct and varied NPCs to fulfill your various house-managing needs. [/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4]All Potential stewards are essential and cannot be killed.[/size][/font]
[/list][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits[/size][/color][/font] 
[font=Times New Roman][size=4]Big thanks to Kalilies & Stealthic for KS Hairdo's Renewal and LogRaam for the Eyes of Beauty.[/size][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]KS Hairdo's[/url]﻿[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes of Beauty [/url]﻿[/size][/font]
[/list]

[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70]Nude Females[/url]﻿ by Thepal[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/]Better Females[/url]﻿ by Bella[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/]Better Males & Younger Faces[/url]﻿ by Chris57[/size][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52872]Vampire Eyes of Coldharbour[/url]﻿ by Gendundrup[/size][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang
